Butter Chicken.description: Tender chicken pieces in a creamy tomato-based sauce, with a perfect balance of spices. Mildly spicy.

Paneer Butter Masala.description: A rich and creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes, delicately spiced for a mild heat.

Samosa.description: Golden fried pastry filled with a savory mixture of spiced potatoes and peas. Mildly spicy.

Ramen.description: Japanese noodle soup dish with Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat or fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and uses toppings such as sliced pork, nori, menma, and scallions.
